topic.title: Embed Schematron Quick Fixes in Relax NG or XML Schema

body.p: Schematron Quick Fixes can be embedded into a Relax NG or XML Schema within the Schematron rules from annotations (using the appinfo element), or in any Schematron rule of a RELAX NG Schema.
is able to extract and use the embedded Schematron Quick Fixes. To make the Schematron Quick Fixes available, validate the document with both the RELAX NG schema and its embedded Schematron rules.
